resources.string:
"Hourly, daily and monthly parking available at the NCP London Shaftesbury car park.

" "If you're driving a van please be aware that there's a height restriction of 1.83m.

" "For a season ticket please click on the 'Long Term' tab and complete the booking request form.

" "Available to book instantly online for hourly and daily bookings.

" "Your booking allows you to enter and exit the car park once and by booking online you guarantee yourself

" "a space and also receive up to 15% off the pay and display rates."
